resultset.statement: select log.content_type, log.group_name, count(log.group_id) AS num, DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY) AS startData, CURDATE() AS endDate FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name LIKE 'com.tencent.%qq%' AND log.content_type = 2 AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 6 DAY) GROUP BY log.group_id ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 20
